title: General Azure Quiz
description: This quiz tests your general knowledge of Azure services and concepts.

questions.title: Azure Compute Services
questions.text: Which of the following are Azure compute services?

answerOptions.explanation: Correct; Azure Virtual Machines provide scalable compute resources.
Correct; Azure Functions is a serverless compute service.
Incorrect; Azure Storage is used for storing data, not compute.
Incorrect; Azure CDN is for content distribution, not compute.

questions.title: Azure VM Management
questions.text: Which Azure service is designed for managing a group of load-balanced virtual machines?

answerOptions.explanation: Correct; VM Scale Sets manage a group of load-balanced VMs.
Incorrect; Azure Batch is used for running large-scale parallel and high-performance computing applications.
Incorrect; Azure Blob Storage is a service for storing large amounts of unstructured data.

questions.title: Order of Azure Service Deployment
questions.text: Arrange the following Azure services in the order typically deployed in a new project:

answerOptions.explanation: Azure Functions are typically added last in this sequence, as they are serverless and often rely on other infrastructure to trigger and manage their execution.
Azure Virtual Machines are usually set up early in the project to provide the fundamental compute infrastructure necessary for running applications.
Following VMs, Azure Kubernetes Service is deployed to manage containerized applications, allowing for easier scaling and management of these containers.
Azure Active Directory is typically deployed first as it is essential for establishing secure access and identity management across all other Azure services.

questions.correctAnswer: Azure Blob Storage, Azure Table Storage
questions.title: Azure Storage Types
questions.text: Which of the following are types of Azure Storage services?

answerOptions.explanation: Correct; Azure Blob Storage is used for storing unstructured data.
Correct; Azure Table Storage is a NoSQL store for schemaless storage.
Incorrect; Azure Event Hubs is a data streaming service.
Incorrect; AKS is used for deploying and managing containerized applications.

questions.title: Azure Blob Storage Access Tiers
questions.text: What are the three access tiers available in Azure Blob Storage?

answerOptions.explanation: Correct; these are the three access tiers of Azure Blob Storage.
Incorrect; these are performance tiers, not access tiers.
Incorrect; these terms refer to cloud deployment models.

questions.title: Azure Networking Components
questions.text: Which of the following are components used for Azure network security and segmentation?

answerOptions.explanation: Correct; VNets are used for network segmentation in Azure.
Incorrect; Azure DNS is used for domain name resolution, not direct network segmentation.
Correct; NSGs are used to control inbound and outbound traffic to network interfaces.
Incorrect; Logic Apps are for workflow automation, not networking.

questions.title: Azure Load Balancing
questions.text: Which Azure service is used to distribute incoming network traffic across multiple virtual machines?

answerOptions.explanation: Correct; Azure Load Balancer distributes incoming network traffic across multiple targets.
Incorrect; Traffic Manager uses DNS to direct client requests to the most appropriate endpoint.
Incorrect; Azure Firewall provides centralized network security policy enforcement.
